entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IndexOutOfRangeException when using one-shot AES decrypt with empty array #109658
    10.0.0
  • Libraries jitstress: Assertion failed 'target->hasProfileWeight()' #109657
    10.0.0
  • [9.0][wasm] error NETSDK1147: To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: wasm-tools #109653
  • Improve Arm64 Performance in .NET 10 #109652
    10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Support assembly check for SVE APIs while testing #109644
  • ARM64-SVE: Optimise mask usage for AddSequentialAcross function #109643
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: error IL1012: IL Trimmer has encountered an unexpected error. #109640
    10.0.0
  • [browser][MT] JSHostImplementation.CallEntrypoint - The handle is invalid #109636
    10.0.0
  • JIT struct work planned for .NET 10 #109635
    10.0.0
  • How to change System.Private.CoreLib.dll find path? #109633
  • Runtime-async open issues #109632
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.ProcessStart_OnLinux_UsesSpecifiedProgramUsingArgumentList #109630

Closed

  • CancellationToken.CanBeCanceled returns True for disposed CancellationTokenSource #109639
  • ARM64 Real World - Roslyn #89119
    Future
  • [ARM] JIT Compile time is too slower than mono(4.4.2) #6589
    Future
  • [ARM32/ARM64] Introducing swap operation without temporary register #6323
    Future
  • Arm64: Use VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension APIs in libraries #84328
    Future
  • Optimize workload upload step #60687
    Future
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException: Invalid argument when buffers count is greater than 1024 #108383
    10.0.0
  • Environment.GetFolderPath(SpecialFolder.LocalApplicationData) returns empty path on certain macOS #109614
  • Move dotnet/runtime to new RPM tooling #109518
    10.0.0
  • [browser] why is the garbage collector not doing its job? #108397
    10.0.0
  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClientAsync has periodically spikes (every 5 minutes). #108721
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add Span<byte> support to System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData #108734
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Check input length for empty when decrypting with padding #109660
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Remove CoreCLR PAL's InternalNew/Delete and just use new/delete with std::nothrow #109659
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: postdominators #109656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update trimmer attributes for `ComActivator` #109655
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] add v2 ExecutionManager contract for NibbleMap change #109654
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Slight clean-up of mock descriptors test helpers #109651
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix upload conflict Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref in official build #109650
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Set TargetsLinuxGlibc to false on Android #109649
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109648
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109646
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 9.0.x
  • extend xml docs with OverflowException information #109645
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 10.0.0
  • Rework HttpClient content buffering #109642
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [NO REVIEW] experiment with indirect result #109637
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Remove unnecessary StreamReader.EndOfStream call from NetworkInformation #109631
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • Use 1ES templateContext for workloads upload #109647
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Move GenTreeVecCon and GenTreeMskCon under the respective FEATURE_* defines #104932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Simplify temporary keychain password-gen #109422
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • Avoid hardcoded illink.tasks TFM #109634
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle IOV_MAX limit in RandomAccess #109340
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Exclude shared libs from ilcframework in nupkg #109253
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109511
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.12
  • Convert dotnet/runtime to use the new Arcade tooling for RPMs #109526
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove and readd .deb, .rpm, and .pkg as FileExtensionSignInfos #109628
    needs-area-label
  • Expand an optimization for short values to IgnoreCase in single-value SearchValues<string> #108368
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Check in offsets files used for AOT cross compilers #109612
    area-Build-mono
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Fix up some documented exceptions #108896
    area-System.Collections
  • Add Span<byte> overloads for ProtectedData #109529
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on System.Version #109252
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Remove uncompiled `net7.0` files #109342
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add regression testing for source generated with .NET 9 #109448
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Respect `ClassInterfaceAttribute` during COM server activation #109616
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Handle non-default active version and explicit IL code version cases for `CodeVersions.GetActiveNativeCodeVersion` #109560
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml and System.Data.Common #109528
    area-System.Xml
  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Constant Time Lookup NibbleMap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #109567
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • [EventTrace] AddEventPipe filter data parsing #109624
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [EventTrace] Update check for provider triggered GC #109587
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add support for (experimental) profile-based trimming #108049
    Hackathon, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Add support for deterministic compilation #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Build the cdac as part of clr.tools instead of as a prereq to the runtime native build #109598
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update Android image to one with a new NDK and command line tools #109622
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #109580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add CreateChained to RateLimiter #107230
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile instead of USERPROFILE #108559
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadSequence #109595
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadSequence #109596
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Implement Vector.AddSaturate/SubtractSaturate #107193
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Mark some intrinsics as must-expand for NAOT due to ILScanner dependencies #109609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2577970 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement `DAMT.*WithInherited` #109608
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Update IHttpClientLogger.cs and IHttpClientAsyncLogger.cs remarks #109618
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [HTTP] WinHttpHandler - Increase the default drain size #109610
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Speed up single-value SearchValues<string> candidate verification #108365
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [WASIp2] soft debugger via sockets #109584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add ObsoleteAttribute and EditorBrowsable(Never) to DynamicDependency.Condition #107104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add left handed spherical and cyclindrical billboards #109605
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Apply OverloadResolutionPriority to Span-based delegating to ROS counterparts #109602
    area-System.Memory
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • fix for `MissingTestException` #109577
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
